text: The Communist Party of Togo (, abbreviated PCT) is a communist party in Togo. It publishes the newspaper Révolution and has a youth wing, the Communist Youth Organisation of Togo (OJCT). == History == The party was established on 4 May 1980 and originally followed the political line of the Albanian Party of Labour. The PCT evolved out of the Communist Group of Togo (GCT), which was later known as Communist Organisation of Togo (OCT). == References == == External links == * Official website Category:Political parties established in 1980 Category:Political parties in Togo Category:Communism in Togo Togo Category:Anti-revisionist organizations Category:1980 establishments in Togo
title: Communist Party of Togo
